wblut.hemesh

Class HEM_Bend

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HEM_Modifier
      • wblut.hemesh.HEM_Bend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HE_Machine

    public class HEM_Bend
extends HEM_Modifier
    Bend a mesh. Determined by a ground plane, a bend axis and an angle factor.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
